pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Flutter 是 Google 开源的 UI 工具包，帮助开发者通过一套代码库高效构建多平台精美应用，支持移动、Web、桌面和嵌入式平台。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"flutter_infra","children":"flutter_infra"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"获取最新稳定版 Flutter SDK 安装包可从镜像站下载"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/flutter_infra/releases/stable/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Flutter 开发依赖于 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://flutter.cn/docs/development/tools/sdk/upgrading","rel":"nofollow","children":"SDK 的升级"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://pub.flutter-io.cn/","rel":"nofollow","children":"Dart Package 生态"}],"，
因此，如果您的网络访问 Google 受阻，需要将您开发设备的如下两个环境变量设置指向镜像站："]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"FLUTTER_STORAGE_BASE_URL"}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"PUB_HOSTED_URL"}]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"设定方式如下："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"export FLUTTER_STORAGE_BASE_URL="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"若希望长期使用镜像："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"echo 'export FLUTTER_STORAGE_BASE_URL="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"' >> ~/.bashrc","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"PUB_HOSTED_URL"}]," 部分可以参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/dart-pub/","children":"Dart Pub 帮助"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["部分镜像站将 flutter_infra 单列为一个镜像，可以参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/flutter_infra/","children":"Flutter Infra 帮助"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"downloadflutterio","children":"download.flutter.io"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在编译 android 项目时，flutter 还会从 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://storage.googleapis.com/download.flutter.io","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://storage.googleapis.com/download.flutter.io"}]," 下载 Java 程序库，您可以在 Android 项目目录下的 build.gradle 中添加下面一行下载源，从而使用镜像源。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"allprojects {
    repositories {
        google()
        jcenter()
        maven { url '{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/download.flutter.io' }
    }
}"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"flutter-sdk","children":"Flutter SDK"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Flutter SDK 的更新会从 Github 获取，如您的开发设备访问 Github 速度慢，可以参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/flutter-sdk.git/","children":"Flutter SDK 镜像"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["更多 Flutter 资源和中文文档，
请访问 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://flutter.cn","rel":"nofollow","children":"Flutter 中文资源网站 (flutter.cn)"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://dart.cn/","rel":"nofollow","children":"Dart 中文文档网站 (dart.cn)"}],"。"]}]]}]

meta.title: Flutter 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
